healthcheck.UserNotice-Session-expired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
healthcheck.Backend-Unavailable-Reason: If this is your initial setup or you just updated your Blona deployment, this is likely because the backend is still starting up. Give it a minute or two, and then refresh the page. If that does not work, make sure the backend is setup and/or contact Blona.

welcomeModal.Step2-desc: Connectors are the way that Blona gets data from your organization's various data sources. Once setup, we'''ll automatically sync data from your apps and docs into Blona, so you can search through all of them in one place.
welcomeModal.Step2Chat-desc: Click the button below to start chatting with the LLM setup above! Don't worry, if you do decide later on you want to connect your organization's knowledge, you can always do that in the
welcomeModal.ChangeLater: If you want to change the key later, you'll be able to easily to do so in the Admin Panel.
welcomeModal.plan: How are you planning on using Blona?
welcomeModal.search-msg: If you're looking to search through, chat with, or ask direct questions of your organization's knowledge, then this is the option for you!
welcomeModal.chatgpt-msg: If you're looking for a pure ChatGPT-like experience, then this is the option for you!

NoCompleteSourceModal.Not-fully-synched: ‚è≥ None of your connectors have finished a full sync yet
NoCompleteSourceModal.Connected-but-not-synched: You've connected some sources, but none of them have finished syncing. Depending on the size of the knowledge base(s) you've connected to Blona, it can take anywhere between 30 seconds to a few days for the initial sync to complete. So far we've synced
NoCompleteSourceModal.connector-status: To view the status of your syncing connectors, head over to the
NoCompleteSourceModal.Partial-Question: Or, click here to continue and ask questions on the partially synced knowledge set.

NoSourcesModal.Connect-at-least-one-source: Before using Search you'll need to connect at least one source. Without any connected knowledge sources, there isn't anything to search over.
NoSourcesModal.Or-without-Source: Or, if you're looking for a pure ChatGPT-like experience without any organization specific knowledge, then you can head over to the Chat page and start chatting with Blona right away!

results.warning-desc: the AI did not think this question was answerable.
results.quotes-not-found: Did not find any exact quotes to support the above answer.

admin.connector-text: Connect Danswer to your organization's knowledge sources. We'll automatically sync your data into Danswer, so you can find exactly what you're looking for in one place.
admin.import-text: Connect to pieces of knowledge that live outside your apps. Upload files, scrape websites, or connect to your organization's Google Site.
admin.setup-text: Setup auto-syncing from your organization's most used apps and services. Unless otherwise specified during the connector setup, we will pull in the latest updates from the source every 10 minutes.

assistants.delete-assistant-text: Click the button below to permanently delete this assistant.
assistants.author: Author
assistants.view-assistant-text: Discover and create custom assistants that combine instructions, extra knowledge, and any combination of tools.
assistants.remove-error-no-assistant: Cannot remove {assistantName} - you must have at least one assistant.
assistants.remove-success: {assistantName} has been removed from your list.
assistants.remove-error: {assistantName} could not be removed from your list.
assistants.add-assistant: {assistantName} has been removed to your list.
assistants.add-assistant-error: {assistantName} could not be added to your list.
assistants.assistants-msg: Assistants allow you to customize your experience for a specific purpose. Specifically, they combine instructions, extra knowledge, and any combination of tools.
assistants.active-assistants-msg: The order the assistants appear below will be the order they appear in the Assistants dropdown. The first assistant listed will be your default assistant when you start a new chat.
assistants.hidden-assistants-msg: Assistants you've created that aren't currently visible in the Assistants selector.
assistants.add-success: {assistantName} has been added to your list.
assistants.add-fail: {assistantName} could not be added to your list.
assistants.provide-name: Must provide a name for the Assistant
assistants.provide-description: Must provide a description for the Assistant
assistants.system-prompt-or-task-prompt: Must provide either System Prompt or Additional Instructions
assistants.form-errors: Cannot submit while there are errors in the form
assistants.non-default-llm: Must select a model if a non-default LLM provider is chosen
assistants.create-assistant-no-response: Failed to create Assistant - no response received
assistants.name: Name
assistants.name-tooltip: Used to identify the Assistant in the UI.
assistants.description-tooltip: Used for identifying assistants and their use cases.
assistants.description-placeholder: e.g. 'Use this Assistant to help draft professional emails'
assistants.system-prompt-tooltip: Gives your assistant a prime directive
assistants.system-prompt-placeholder: e.g. 'You are a professional email writing assistant that always uses a polite enthusiastic tone, emphasizes action items, and leaves blanks for the human to fill in when you have unknowns'
assistants.llm-override-tooltip: Select a Large Language Model (Generative AI model) to power this Assistant
assistants.llm-override-msg: You assistant will use your system default (currently {defaultModelName}) unless otherwise specified below.
assistants.capabilities-tooltip: You can give your assistant advanced capabilities like image generation
assistants.search-through: that this Assistant should search through. If none are specified, the Assistant will search through all available documents in order to try and respond to queries.
assistants.reach-out: If this functionality would be useful, reach out to the administrators of Blona for assistance.
assistants.number-chunks-tooltip: How many chunks to feed the LLM
assistants.llm-relevance-msg: If enabled, the LLM will filter out chunks that are not relevant to the user query.
assistants.include-citations-msg: If set, the response will include bracket citations ([1], [2], etc.) for each document used by the LLM to help inform the response. This is the same technique used by the default Assistants. In general, we recommend to leave this enabled in order to increase trust in the LLM answer.
assistants.additional-instructions-placeholder: e.g. 'Remember to reference all of the points mentioned in my message to you and focus on identifying action items that can move things forward'
assistants.starter-name-msg: Shows up as the "title" for this Starter Message. For example, "Write an email".
assistants.starter-description-msg: A description which tells the user what they might want to use this Starter Message for. For example "to a client about a new feature"
assistants.starter-message-msg: The actual message to be sent as the initial user message if a user selects this starter prompt. For example, "Write me an email to a client about a new billing feature we just released."
assistants.control-user-access: Control which other users should have access to this assistant.

chat.llm-context-limit: LLM context limit reached üòî If you want to chat with this document, please de-select others to free up space.
chat.documents-msg: Select to add to continuous context
chat.no-documents-found: No documents found for the query.
chat.documents-question: When you run ask a question, the retrieved documents will show up here!
chat.delete-folder-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {folderName}? All the content inside this folder will also be deleted
chat.message-placeholder: Send a message or @ to tag an assistant...
chat.time-range-msg: Choose the time range we should search over. If only one date is selected, will only search after the specified date.
chat.knowledge-sets-msg: Choose which knowledge sets we should search over. If multiple are selected, we will search through all of them.
chat.sources-msg: Choose which sources we should search over. If multiple sources are selected, we will search through all of them.
chat.override-model: Override the default model for the {assistantName} assistant. The override will only apply for the current chat session.
chat.temperature-msg: Adjust the temperature of the LLM. Higher temperatures will make the LLM generate more creative and diverse responses, while lower temperature will make the LLM generate more conservative and focused responses.
chat.delete-confirm: Click below to confirm that you want to delete
chat.feedback-like: (Optional) What did you like about this response?
chat.feedback-dislike: (Optional) What was the issue with the response? How could it be improved?
chat.share-msg: This chat session is currently shared. Anyone at your organization can view the message history using the following link:
chat.private-chat: Click the button below to make the chat private again
chat.share-security-msg: Ensure that all content in the chat is safe to share with the whole organization. The content of the retrieved documents will not be visible, but the names of cited documents as well as the AI and human messages will be visible.
chat.select-assistant: Select an Assistant below to start chatting with them!
chat.remove-from-folder-fail: Failed to remove chat from folder
chat.shared-chat-not-found: Did not find a shared chat with the specified ID.
chat.empty-search: Try running a search! Your search history will appear here.
chat.empty-chat: Try sending a message! Your chat history will appear here.

SwitchModelModal.switch-model-desc1: We've detected you are using our old default embedding model
SwitchModelModal.switch-model-desc2: We believe that search performance can be dramatically improved by a simple model switch.
SwitchModelModal.switch-model-desc3: Please click the button below to choose a new model. Don't worry, the re-indexing necessary for the switch will happen in the background - your use of Blona will not be interrupted.

search.agentic-search-msg-1: Our most powerful search, have an AI agent guide you to pinpoint exactly what you're looking for.
search.fast-search-msg: Get quality results immediately, best suited for instant access to your documents.

auth.verification-email: Hey {currentUserEmail} - it looks like you haven't verified your email yet.
auth.check-inbox: Check your inbox for an email from us to get started!
auth.dont-see: If you don't see anything, click
